abstract: At the bank, the White House chief of staff earned a $675,000 salary for 2010, a roughly $3 million cash-and-stock bonus for 2009 and a $4.8 million bonus for 2010.
snippet: At the bank, the White House chief of staff earned a $675,000 salary for 2010, a roughly $3 million cash-and-stock bonus for 2009 and a $4.8 million bonus for 2010.
lead_paragraph: The White House’s new chief of staff, William M. Daley, is rich — so much so that his recent earnings from JPMorgan Chase appear to give even Jamie Dimon’s pay package a run for the money.

headline.main: William Daley Made $8.7 Million from JPMorgan Last Year
